name: Devstral Medium (2507)
description: Enterprise-grade text model for software engineering use cases. Optimized for deep integration with agent frameworks like OpenHands and SWE-Agent.
notes: Released July 2025. Features 24B parameters with 128K context. Achieves 61.6% on SWE-Bench Verified, outperforming Gemini 2.5 Pro and GPT 4.1.
